author: dandiep
msg: Fix up support for Aegis exceptions. This mostly involved adding a FaultOutInterceptor
and making Aegis/W3CDOMStreamReader work with the latest DepthXMLStreamReader change.
I also added a hook to pass in the actual Fault object to Aegis so it could build
CXF-811: Fix the problem with missing types in the WSDL for Aegis.
Fix a problem where argument names were arg00 with the simple frontend.
You may notice I added a FaultInfoException class as well. This makes it possible to
use databindings like JAXB which don't support serializing exceptions, with the simple

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-814] Fix namespace issue with schemas on server side

author: rfeng
msg: Add the WireableBinding back to support other potential wireable bindings, i.e., bindings that can handle the "target" attribute of reference

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-3308 explicitly allow persistence xml in web plans, missed the helpful schema munging

author: ppoddar
msg: Making inner ConfigurationParser public for reuse.
